about_the_game: Beatographer is the Beat Cartographer - a game that lets you map out the beats of all music. Originally designed for Beat the Rhythm and Holodance, Beatographer supports all relevant VR beatmap formats, so you can use this to author beatmaps / levels for your favorite VR rhythm or music game. Join a community of music and rhythm game enthusiasts in the quest to beatmap all music.

short_description: Join a crowd of music and VR rhythm game enthusiasts in the noble quest to beatmap all music using the best VR beatmapping tool available on the planet. Supports all styles: Punching, slicing, shooting, dancing! Feel the beat, create the map, become #1 in the leaderboards!
